name: SAY.TV
overview: SAY.TV is the first television social network where the television involves the Internet users to the TV production processes. SAY.TV has developed software for launching the Internet users live on air. All that is needed – to have the software established on the TV-channel, and for the user – good quality Internet, PC and a web-camera. In such a way we ensure the integration of our audience into TV programme. SAY.TV offers its platform as a social network for interactive video communication with range of video services – video mail, video comments, video conference. SAY.TV was the first to video avatar as new way for user’s selfidentification.
